Title: Wrath of the Titans
Overview: Perseus tries to live a quieter life as a village fisherman while - dangerously weakened by humanity's lack of devotion - the gods are losing control of the long-imprisoned Titans and their ferocious leader, Kronos.
Keywords: underworld, hades, mythology, greek mythology, zeus, perseus, gods, ancient greece, based on greek myth, ares, 3d
production_companies: Legendary Pictures, Thunder Road Pictures, Warner Bros., Cott Productions, Furia de Titanes II, A.I.E.
Cast: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes
